Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor and the Submarine Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke O'Dowd as Human Meteor as he investigates a suspicious yacht and uncovers a Japanese submarine conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi to the Waterfront
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor and Duke's taxi ride to the waterfront, setting the stage for the unfolding mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Chase
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor and confronts the suspicious G-Men following him.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Cop Shooters and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor deals with 'cop shooters' and is later found by police, setting up his next mission.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Holden reveals the Jap sub conspiracy and Duke plans to infiltrate the yacht with Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby sneaks aboard the yacht but is quickly discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Crew's Suspicion and Toby Overboard
sub_scenes.description: Yacht crew activities, depth chart discovery by Pete, and Toby gets thrown overboard.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Realization and Yacht's Contact
sub_scenes.description: Duke senses Toby's danger, and the yacht crew decides to contact him about the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives, discovers the sunken submarine, and encounters hostile divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Intervention and Attacks
sub_scenes.description: Namor enters the scene, targeting both the submarine and the yacht, creating chaos.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Arrival, Depth Map, and Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Duke arrives at the yacht, searches for and finds the depth map, revealing Peter's treachery.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Speedboat chase, hospital visit to Holden, and Duke's return home, wrapping up the immediate events.

Major_Arcs.title: The Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Skip and Chuck as they stumble upon a Nazi spy ring operating from a bus company garage.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Liberty Lads and a scene of an ambulance arriving at a house observed by Skip and another boy.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Visit
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a bus company garage and encounter Major Bronson in disguise.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Confrontation and Bronson's Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys return the wallet and are led into a trap, where Major Bronson reveals his deadly plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Uprising and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Chaos erupts, followed by Bronson's violent intervention to regain control.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Barracks Alert
sub_scenes.description: Chuck seeks help from Marines, while Skip discovers a secret office revealing sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Fight and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, a fight ensues at the barracks, and the Nazi spies are defeated.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Rosita Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry as they get entangled in the kidnapping of President's daughter, Rosita, in South America.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction in South America and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in South America, leading to immediate suspicion and questioning by local soldiers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: The Champ and Henry are detained and interrogated, revealing Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Car Ride and Mama's House
sub_scenes.description: Men discuss El Tigre, get forced into a car, and arrive at 'Mama's' house, leading to a misunderstanding.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Hideout Assault and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Planning to approach El Tigre's hideout, infiltration, diversion, and reveal of El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rosita's Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Garbage bin interrogation, search for Rosita, El Tigre's denial and accusation, leading to news of Rosita's location and rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Assault and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Horseback assault continues alongside hotel infiltration, citadel escape attempt, and Rosita is finally found and rescued amidst ongoing fights.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Various fight scenes concluding, government intervention, recognition of help, and a sense of resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Justice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, dealing with disobeyed orders and seeking justice for a fallen comrade.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, leading to a 'grave matter' report to a superior officer.

sub_scenes.title: Disobeyed Orders and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: High-ranking officer's dismay over disobeyed orders is contrasted with a soldier's reassurance to Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and gets ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity, Torture, and Dolan's Deal
sub_scenes.description: Captured man before Grauer, torture threats, and Dolan makes a deal with a foreign agent to save himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Justification, Flashback, and Burning Huts
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, flashback to Sam burning, and Grauer's indifferent orders amidst burning native huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Jungle ambush, chief's accidental death, and Dolan forms an alliance with the natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma, Sam's fight, and Dolan's disciplinary spanking for disobeying orders, ending with a service lesson.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Blood Transfusion Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate a murder and get involved in a desperate need for a blood transfusion.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Confrontation and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins in a city street scene, followed by a murder investigation assignment at the news office.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Evidence and Police Station Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Evidence against Tom Reilly is presented, and the Twins inquire about Guy Reilly at the police station.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Miss Reilly's Condition
sub_scenes.description: Journey to the hospital, inquiry about Miss Reilly, and meeting the sick little girl.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Crisis and Community Appeal
sub_scenes.description: Miss Reilly's blood type mismatch, hospital staff's plea for help, and Dan's call for blood donors.

narrative_arcs.title: Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion
Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat

sub_scenes.title: Pursuing Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Decision to look for Tom Reilly, search in the Irish section, and Mrs. Murphy reveals Tom Reilly's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section
Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Street Brawl Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Taxi ambush, Dan's pursuit, neighborhood blockade, street brawl, and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Aftermath and Blood Transfusion Success
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the brawl, hospital transport, anxious waiting, community blood rush, and successful blood transfusion for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry against Farnacci, police mobilization, pool room interrogation leading to Farnacci's arrest, and a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
